name: Katsushika Hokusai
skill: Increases the crit rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by 45/55% for a limited time.
ability: Sharply increases the critical DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK.

additional_data.description: The spirit of an artist from Japan's Edo Period. After becoming a spirit he started drawing in the air instead of on paper, and whatever he draws comes to life and starts chasing people.  It's pretty cool, but as a result he never has any portfolio pieces to show off afterwards.

main: "You like my drawings? Wonderful, wonderful!  Have a seat and relax.  I'll draw you a nice one!"
summon: "My drawings are full of life and vigor!  Shall I show you?"
limit_break: "Yes! I feel the inspiration flowing! Now I can create a true masterpiece!"
